description:
If you're interested in photography and taking beautiful or creative photographs it's essential to know your equipment, and how it works. Learn how to take better photographs by taking control of your camera in this less than 1-hour online course. In this course we'll cover:

  • Exposure (shutter, aperture, and ISO)
  • Metering
  • Camera settings to optimize your photographs

Included with the course is are downloadable PDF training and planning guides, homework assignments, a quiz, and project planning guide to help you successfully tell a story or show a moment.
title: Digital Photography: Capturing the Moment
